name: Hide and Seek
description: It is a very fanny, fast and easy game which can be played by adults as well as children. This game has two teams that try to prevent each othe from winning.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 1GB / AMD Radeon HD 6790 1GB Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB Storage: 500 MB available space
